title: Pen Oruthi Song Lyrics Gemini
stanzas:
Pen Oruthi Song Lyrics #Gemini
#Bharathwaj #SPB

pen oruthi pen oruthi
padaithu vittai
ennidathil ennidathil
anuppi vaithaai

uyirodu enai
uzhayil yaetrinaai.

neruppukku selaikatti
anuppi vaithaai
nilavukku vanmuraigal
kattru koduthaai

en kannil yaen
oosi yaetrinaai.

brahmma oh brahmma
idhu thaguma idhu thaguma
ayyo idhu varamaa
saabamaa (2)

pen oruthi pen oruthi
padaithu vittai
ennidathil ennidathil
anuppi vaithaai

uyirodu enai
uzhayil yaetrinaai.

kangalile boutham paarthen
kannathil samanam paarthen
paarvai mattum kolaigal
seyya paarkiren

parkalilum karunai parthen
padhangalil dheivam parthen
punnagaiyo uyirai
thinna paarkiren.

puyal endru ninaithen ennai
puyal kattum kayiraai vandhaal.
malai endru ninaithen ennai
malligaiyaal malaiyai saaithaal

netri pottil ennai
urutti vaithaale.

brahmma oh brahmma
idhu thaguma idhu thaguma
ayyo idhu varamaa
saabamaa (2)
pen oruthi..

pagal ellaam karuppaai poga
iravellaam vellai aaga
en vazhvil yedhedho maatramo
ayyayyo ulaga urundai
adi vayitril suttruvadhenna
achchacho thondai
varaiyil yaerumo..

erimalaiyin kondai mele
rojaavai nattaval yaaro.
kadhal enum kanavaai vazhiye
en dhedam pugunthaval yaaro

siru siruga uyirai
parugi sendraale..

brahmma oh brahmma
idhu thaguma idhu thaguma
ayyo idhu varamaa
saabamaa (2)

pen oruthi pen oruthi
padaithu vittai
ennidathil ennidathil
anuppi vaithaai

uyirodu enai
uzhayil yaetrinaai.

neruppukku selaikatti
anuppi vaithaai
nilavukku vanmuraigal
kattru koduthaai

en kannil yaen
oosi yaetrinaai.

brahmma oh brahmma
idhu thaguma idhu thaguma
ayyo idhu varamaa
saabamaa

seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Gemini, Bharadwaj, SPB, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
